title: Pixel 3a is restarting randomly without user interference
content:
My pixel 3a which is less than 10 days old keeps restarting on its own. I got to know this when it asked for pin instead of fingerprint if I try to unlock the device. Not sure, why this is happening with all upto date software & apps installed.  My batter is completely charged & no issue with the case that i have on it. 

anyone else facing same problem?
